function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of disclosure of competing interests","Impact":"Potential bias in the information presented","Mitigation":"Require disclosure of competing interests to ensure transparency and objectivity","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Readers, consumers of the information","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, publishers"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of the literature","Impact":"Spread of misinformation and inaccurate understanding of the topic","Mitigation":"Encourage thorough fact-checking and verification of sources","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, data analysis software","People":"Readers, researchers, general public","Owner":"Research institutions, fact-checking organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffective implementation of proposed solutions","Impact":"Failure to address real-world challenges related to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Pilot testing, stakeholder engagement, and continuous evaluation","Technologies":"Project management tools, data analysis software","People":"Policy makers, healthcare professionals, community leaders","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, healthcare organizations"}]}
